name: Canadian Old Fashioned
description: Smooth and approachable with gentle sweetness and citrus aroma—an easy entry into whiskey cocktails.

name: Canadian Manhattan
description: Soft, lightly sweet, and elegant—classic Manhattan structure without the sharp whiskey bite.

name: Chocolate Canadian Manhattan
description: Dark chocolate warmth layered over a smooth Manhattan base—rich but balanced.

name: Banana Rum Old Fashioned
description: Subtle banana aroma with deep rum richness—playful yet grown-up.

name: House Margarita
description: Bright, balanced, and refreshing. Available in Classic Lime, Peach, Pineapple, or Limoncello.

name: Raspberry Collins
description: Light, bubbly, and gently fruity with a crisp citrus finish.

name: Peach Collins
description: Soft peach sweetness lifted by lemon and fizz—easy and refreshing.

name: Limoncello Collins
description: Bright Italian lemon with a smooth, sunny finish.

name: Paloma-Style Highball
description: Fresh-squeezed grapefruit balanced with lime and tequila—crisp and refreshing.

name: Fresh Paloma
description: Juicy, lightly sweet grapefruit with a clean tequila backbone.

name: Grapefruit Gin Spritz
description: Floral gin and fresh grapefruit in a light, elegant spritz.

name: Amaretto Sour
description: Velvety, nutty, and perfectly balanced with a silky foam top.

name: Peach Sunset
description: Layered and visually stunning with sweet peach and citrus flavors.
